title: Workshop on Simulation-Based Learning Design Evaluation Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories and experience in primary education settings
context.additional_context: A course for in-service elementary teachers to enhance learning design evaluation competencies using simulation tools. Operated with a hands-on approach utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Can derive three strategic criteria for evaluating learning design and explain their application methods
Can implement and validate a learning design evaluation model using simulation tools
Can create an educational improvement roadmap and prioritize actions based on evaluation results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
